info.title: SEC Smart API
info.description:
This is the API for the SEC Smart System.
ACHTUNG: Diese API ist noch nicht für den produktiven Einsatz freigegeben!

tags.name: Users
tags.description: All endpoints related to a device's users

tags.name: Areas
tags.description: All endpoints related to a device's areas to be operated

tags.name: Telemetry
tags.description: All endpoints related to a device's Telemetry data

tags.name: Notifications
tags.description: All endpoints related to a device's notifications

tags.name: Controller
tags.description: All endpoints related to a device's controller information

tags.name: Gateway
tags.description: All endpoints related to a device's gateway information

tags.name: Settings
tags.description: All endpoints related to a device's settings

tags.name: Setup
tags.description: All endpoints related to a device's setup

get.summary: Returns an object array of all your registered devices.
get.description: Returns an array filled with shortened device objects consisting of type, id and name of SEC Smart systems you are associated with.

200.description: An array consisting of shortened device objects

get.description: Returns a device object with the URL-encoded device ID if you are associated with this particular device.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: 6-digit-long alphanumerical ID of the device to be adressed

200.description: A device object representing a SEC Smart system.

put.summary: Sets a free choseable name for your device
put.description: Set a free choseable name for your device.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: 6-digit-long alphanumerical ID of the device to be adressed

get.summary: Returns a device' areas object collection
get.description: Returns the device subobject areas for the URL-encoded device ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: 6-digit-long alphanumerical ID of the device to be adressed

200.description: A areas object representing the areas to operate on of a SEC Smart system.

put.summary: Set a ventilation mode for a given area
put.description: Sets the ventilation mode for the given area.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: 6-digit-long alphanumerical ID of the device to be adressed

areaid.description: Area to apply the ventilation mode to

put.summary: Updates the name for the given area
put.description: Updates the name for the given area.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: 6-digit-long alphanumerical ID of the device to be adressed

areaid.description: Area to apply the label to

put.summary: Set a timed program for a given area
put.description: Sets a timed program for the given area.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: 6-digit-long alphanumerical ID of the device to be adressed

areaid.description: Area to apply the timers to

get.summary: Returns an array containing the email adresses of all users of this device
get.description: Returns an array containing the email adresses of all users of this device.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: 6-digit-long alphanumerical ID of the device to be adressed

200.description: An array of email adresses representing all users of the adressed SEC Smart system.

get.summary: Returns a device' Controller data object
get.description: Returns the device subobject Controller for the URL-encoded device ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: 6-digit-long alphanumerical ID of the device to be adressed

200.description: A Controller object representing controller hardware of a SEC Smart system.

get.summary: Returns a device' Gateway data object
get.description: Returns the device subobject Gateway for the URL-encoded device ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: 6-digit-long alphanumerical ID of the device to be adressed

200.description: A Controller object representing gateway hard- and software configuration of a SEC Smart system.

get.summary: Returns a device' telemetry data object
get.description: Returns the device subobject telemetry for the URL-encoded device ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: 6-digit-long alphanumerical ID of the device to be adressed

200.description: A telemetry object representing the sensor data of a SEC Smart system.

get.summary: Returns a device' notification data object
get.description: Returns the device subobject notification for the URL-encoded device ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: 6-digit-long alphanumerical ID of the device to be adressed

200.description: A notification object representing the sensor data of a SEC Smart system.

get.summary: Returns a device' settings data object
get.description: Returns the device subobject settings for the URL-encoded device ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: 6-digit-long alphanumerical ID of the device to be adressed

200.description: A settings object representing the settings of a SEC Smart system.

put.summary: Set a the filter run time and/or perform a filter reset
put.description: If the maxRunTime is submitted only or the reset is set to false just the maxRunTime changes and no reset will be performed. If the reset is set as true, the filter runt time will be reset with the new maxRunTime. If no maxRunTime is commited, but reset is set to true, the filter run time will be reset using the device' internal save value.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: 6-digit-long alphanumerical ID of the device to be adressed

put.summary: Set the threshold values for humidity and CO² regulation mode
put.description: Either humidity or co2 or both values can be submitted affecting just the chosen values.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: 6-digit-long alphanumerical ID of the device to be adressed

put.summary: Set the desired sleep time for sleep time mode
put.description: Set the sleep time in minutes.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: 6-digit-long alphanumerical ID of the device to be adressed

put.summary: Change the time and date adjustments of your device
put.description: Change the time and date adjustments of your device.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: 6-digit-long alphanumerical ID of the device to be adressed

put.description: Turns the summer ventilation mode on or off.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: 6-digit-long alphanumerical ID of the device to be adressed

get.summary: Returns a device' setup data object
get.description: Returns the device subobject setup for the URL-encoded device ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: 6-digit-long alphanumerical ID of the device to be adressed

200.description: A setup object representing the setup of a SEC Smart system.

put.summary: Set up the assignment what systems are installed in the particular areas
put.description: Set up the assignment what systems are installed in the particular areas.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: 6-digit-long alphanumerical ID of the device to be adressed

put.summary: Set up the assignment what kind of boost mode shall be used in the particular areas
put.description: Set up the assignment what kind of boost mode shall be used in the particular areas.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: 6-digit-long alphanumerical ID of the device to be adressed

put.summary: Set up the configuration for the digital input
put.description: Set up the configuration for the digital input.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: 6-digit-long alphanumerical ID of the device to be adressed

put.summary: Set up the configuration for the analog input
put.description: Set up the configuration for the analog input.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: 6-digit-long alphanumerical ID of the device to be adressed

put.summary: Set up the configuration for the digital output
put.description: Set up the configuration for the digital output.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: 6-digit-long alphanumerical ID of the device to be adressed

put.summary: Perform a factory reset of the SEC Smart System
put.description: Perform a factory reset of the SEC Smart System.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: 6-digit-long alphanumerical ID of the device to be adressed

nonce.description: The Phrase to send here is "I REALLY know what I do!"

area1.description: Remaining time of sleep mode in area 1 in minutes.

area2.description: Remaining time of sleep mode in area 2 in minutes.

area3.description: Remaining time of sleep mode in area 3 in minutes.

area4.description: Remaining time of sleep mode in area 4 in minutes.

area5.description: Remaining time of sleep mode in area 5 in minutes.

area6.description: Remaining time of sleep mode in area 6 in minutes.

restFilterTime.description: Remaining filter run time in days.

co2.description: Actual sensor value of CO² in ppm.

humidity.description: Actual sensor value of humidity in %.

Ti.description: Actual sensor value of room temperature in °C.

Ta.description: Actual sensor value of outside temperature in °C.

uptime.description: Uptime of the SEC Smart system.

filterRanOut.description: Filter time ran out. Filter should be changed and then reset.

actualMessage.description: A Message containing an error code and a sentence what errors exist at this time point.

lastMessage.description: A Message containing a time stamp, an error code and a sentence what error was the last on at which time point.

sleepTime.description: Duration of the sleep mode in minutes.

deviceTime.description: Time and Date of your device. If autoSynch is set to true the device will snych automatically with the internet and all manual changes here will be discarded.

summermode.description: Activation state of the summer ventilation functionality. If active no heat recovery happens.

lower.description: Analog input value in % for the lower setpoint.

upper.description: Analog input value in % for the upper setpoint.

lower.description: Fanlevel to apply at lower setpoint.

upper.description: Fanlevel to apply at upper setpoint.

lower.description: Humidity value in % for humidity regulation mode  to apply at lower setpoint.

upper.description: Humidity value in % for humidity regulation mode  to apply at upper setpoint.

lower.description: CO² value in ppm for CO² regulation mode  to apply at lower setpoint.

upper.description: CO² value in ppm for CO² regulation mode  to apply at upper setpoint.

lower.description: Lower setpoint in °C for linear curve when used for an analog temperature sensor.

upper.description: Upper setpoint in °C for linear curve when used for an analog temperature sensor.

maxRunTime.description: New maximum filter run time in days.

humidity.description: Threshold for humidity regulation in % relative humidity.

co2.description: Threshold for CO² regulation in ppm. Stepsize is 10.

Users.description: An array containing all email adresses of users which are connected to this device.

Controller.description: An object representing a set of data describing your controller hardware configuration.

articleCode.description: Article Code of the Central Control Unit. Please always refer to it if you are reporting issues with your system.

articleCodeTouchPanel1.description: Article Code of the first touch panel. Only shown if connected.

articleCodeTouchPanel2.description: Article Code of the second touch panel. Only shown if connected.

articleCodeTouchPanel3.description: Article Code of the third touch panel. Only shown if connected.

Gateway.description: An object representing a set of data describing your gateway. Please always report this data when reporting issues.

id.description: 6-digit-long alphanumerical ID of the gateway. It is the same as the one of your system.

firmwareVersion.description: The version of the gateway's firmware in the format 'major.minor.fix'.

enum: Field 'name' must be a string with 3 to 32 characters.
Field 'areaid' is mandatory and must be an integer between 1 and 6
Field 'mode' is mandatory and must contain a string of one of this arrays entries: [${modeArray}]
Field 'areaid' is mandatory and must be an integer between 1 and 6
Field 'label' is mandatory and must contain a string of one of this arrays entries: [${labelArray}]
Field 'areaid' is mandatory and must be an integer between 1 and 6
Sub field 'active' of '1' of 'timers' is mandatory and must be a boolean value.
Sub field 'mode' of '1' of 'timers' is mandatory and must contain a string of one of this arrays entries: [${modeArray}]
Sub field 'time' of '1' of 'timers' is mandatory and must contain a string encoding a time value in 'hh:mm'
Sub field 'active' of '2' of 'timers' is mandatory and must be a boolean value.
Sub field 'mode' of '2' of 'timers' is mandatory and must contain a string of one of this arrays entries: [${modeArray}]
Sub field 'time' of '2' of 'timers' is mandatory and must contain a string encoding a time value in 'hh:mm'
Sub field 'active' of '3' of 'timers' is mandatory and must be a boolean value.
Sub field 'mode' of '3' of 'timers' is mandatory and must contain a string of one of this arrays entries: [${modeArray}]
Sub field 'time' of '3' of 'timers' is mandatory and must contain a string encoding a time value in 'hh:mm'
Sub field 'active' of '4' of 'timers' is mandatory and must be a boolean value.
Sub field 'mode' of '4' of 'timers' is mandatory and must contain a string of one of this arrays entries: [${modeArray}]
Sub field 'time' of '4' of 'timers' is mandatory and must contain a string encoding a time value in 'hh:mm'
Sub field 'active' of '5' of 'timers' is mandatory and must be a boolean value.
Sub field 'mode' of '5' of 'timers' is mandatory and must contain a string of one of this arrays entries: [${modeArray}]
Sub field 'time' of '5' of 'timers' is mandatory and must contain a string encoding a time value in 'hh:mm'
Sub field 'maxRunTime' of 'filter' is mandatory and must be an integer between 90 and 270 with a step size of 10.
Sub field 'reset' of 'filter' is mandatory and must be a boolean representing the command to perform a filter reset or not.
Sub field 'co2' of 'thresholds' is mandatory and must be an integer between 100 and 5000 with a step size of 10.
Sub field 'humidity' of 'thresholds' is mandatory and must be an integer between 10 and 95.
Field 'sleepTime' is mandatory and must be an integer between 10 and 250
Sub field 'autoSynch' of 'deviceTime' is mandatory and must be a boolean value.
Sub field 'date' of 'deviceTime' is mandatory and must be a ISO8601 compliant string: 'yyyy-mm-dd'.
Sub field 'time' of 'deviceTime' is mandatory and must contain a string encoding a time value in 'hh:mm'
Field 'summermode' is mandatory and must be a booelan value.
Sub field 'type' of '1' of 'systems' is mandatory and must contain a string of one of this arrays entries: [${systemsArray}]
Sub field 'type' of '2' of 'systems' is mandatory and must contain a string of one of this arrays entries: [${systemsArray}]
Sub field 'type' of '3' of 'systems' is mandatory and must contain a string of one of this arrays entries: [${systemsArray}]
Sub field 'type' of '4' of 'systems' is mandatory and must contain a string of one of this arrays entries: [${systemsArray}]
Sub field 'type' of '5' of 'systems' is mandatory and must contain a string of one of this arrays entries: [${systemsArray}]
Sub field 'type' of '6' of 'systems' is mandatory and must contain a string of one of this arrays entries: [${systemsArray}]
Sub field 'installed' of '1' of 'systems' is mandatory and must contain a string of one of this arrays entries: [${areasArray}]
Sub field 'installed' of '2' of 'systems' is mandatory and must contain a string of one of this arrays entries: [${areasArray}]
Sub field 'installed' of '3' of 'systems' is mandatory and must contain a string of one of this arrays entries: [${areasArray}]
Sub field 'installed' of '4' of 'systems' is mandatory and must contain a string of one of this arrays entries: [${areasArray}]
Sub field 'installed' of '5' of 'systems' is mandatory and must contain a string of one of this arrays entries: [${areasArray}]
Sub field 'installed' of '6' of 'systems' is mandatory and must contain a string of one of this arrays entries: [${areasArray}]
Sub field '1' of 'areas' is mandatory and must contain a string of one of this arrays entries: [${boostModesArray}]
Sub field '2' of 'areas' is mandatory and must contain a string of one of this arrays entries: [${boostModesArray}]
Sub field '3' of 'areas' is mandatory and must contain a string of one of this arrays entries: [${boostModesArray}]
Sub field '4' of 'areas' is mandatory and must contain a string of one of this arrays entries: [${boostModesArray}]
Sub field '5' of 'areas' is mandatory and must contain a string of one of this arrays entries: [${boostModesArray}]
Sub field '6' of 'areas' is mandatory and must contain a string of one of this arrays entries: [${boostModesArray}]
Sub field 'function' of 'digitalInput' is mandatory and must contain a string of one of this arrays entries: [${diFunctionsArray}]
Sub field '1' of 'areas' is mandatory and must contain a boolean value.
Sub field '2' of 'areas' is mandatory and must contain a boolean value.
Sub field '3' of 'areas' is mandatory and must contain a boolean value.
Sub field '4' of 'areas' is mandatory and must contain a boolean value.
Sub field '5' of 'areas' is mandatory and must contain a boolean value.
Sub field '6' of 'areas' is mandatory and must contain a boolean value.
Sub field 'function' of 'digitaanalogInputlInput' is mandatory and must contain a string of one of this arrays entries: [${aiFunctionsArray}]
Sub field 'function' of 'analogInput' is mandatory and must contain a string of one of this arrays entries: [${aiFunctionsArray}]
Sub field '1' of 'areas' is mandatory and must contain a boolean value.
Sub field '2' of 'areas' is mandatory and must contain a boolean value.
Sub field '3' of 'areas' is mandatory and must contain a boolean value.
Sub field '4' of 'areas' is mandatory and must contain a boolean value.
Sub field '5' of 'areas' is mandatory and must contain a boolean value.
Sub field '6' of 'areas' is mandatory and must contain a boolean value.
Sub field '1' of 'x' is mandatory and must contain an integer between 0 and 50.
Sub field '2' of 'x' is mandatory and must contain an integer between 50 and 100.
Sub field '1' of 'yFanlevel' is mandatory and must contain an integer between 0 and 3.
Sub field '2' of 'yFanlevel' is mandatory and must contain an integer between 3 and 6.
Sub field '1' of 'yHumidity' is mandatory and must contain an integer between 0 and 50.
Sub field '2' of 'yHumidity' is mandatory and must contain an integer between 50 and 100.
Sub field '1' of 'yCO2' is mandatory and must contain an integer between 0 and 1500 with a step size of 10.
Sub field '2' of 'yCO2' is mandatory and must contain an integer between 1500 and 5000 with a step size of 10.
Sub field '1' of 'yTemp' is mandatory and must contain an integer between -50 and 0.
Sub field '2' of 'yTemp' is mandatory and must contain an integer between 0 and 50.
Sub field 'function' of 'digitalOuput' is mandatory and must contain a string of one of this arrays entries: [${doFunctionsArray}]
Sub field '1' of 'areas' is mandatory and must contain a boolean value.
Sub field '2' of 'areas' is mandatory and must contain a boolean value.
Sub field '3' of 'areas' is mandatory and must contain a boolean value.
Sub field '4' of 'areas' is mandatory and must contain a boolean value.
Sub field '5' of 'areas' is mandatory and must contain a boolean value.
Sub field '6' of 'areas' is mandatory and must contain a boolean value.
Field 'nonce' is mandatory and must be 'I REALLY know what I do!'.
